wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir  (before 1568 – 31 January 1626/27) was an Anglo-Irish peer. He was the son of Theobald Butler, 1st Baron Cahir and Mary Cusack. He succeeded to the title on 28 April 1596.

link_mentions.page: List of women who died in childbirth
response: *Margaret Butler (1632), daughter of Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir and wife of Edmond Butler, 3rd/13th Baron Dunboyne.
*Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir (born circa 1568, died 31 January 1626/27);
* Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir, son of the 1st Baron. Died without male issue in 1627.
* Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir (died 1627), son of the 1st Baron. Died without a male heir.
He married firstly Margaret Butler, daughter of Thomas Butler, 2nd Baron Cahir and his second wife Ellice Fitzgerald; she died in 1632. They had at least eight children:
